description:
Christmas: the perfect time to conquer the Earth!  Until Keroro finds out about Santa Claus.  When Keroro learns that Santa only gives presents to children who have been good, he goes into a frenzy trying to get on the "nice" list.  There`s stuff he wants to get!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Christmas Daisakusen de Arimasu / Keroro Shigoto Osame no Oosouji de Arimasu
Keroro et la grande opération de Noël / Keroro et le grand nettoyage de la nouvelle année
The Space Frog Who Stole Christmas!
ケロロ クリスマス大作戦 であります / ケロロ 仕事納めの大掃除 であります
